patthana2.2:77.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:77.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—anidassanādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:78.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ anidassanānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:79.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:80.1_0: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:80.1_5: kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:81.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:81.1_2: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.2:82.1_0: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— sanidassanaṁ rūpaṁ aniccato …pe…
patthana2.2:82.1_2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:83.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:83.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.2:84.1_0: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana2.2:84.1_1: Rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anidassanānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:85.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:86.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:87.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:88.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ anidassanānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:89.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.2:89.1_1: **Sahajātā**—anidassanā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:89.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—anidassanā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ anidassanānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:90.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.2:91.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.2:92.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.2:93.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:93.1_1: **Sahajātā**—anidassanā khandhā anidassanānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:93.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe anidassanā khandhā anidassanānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:93.1_3: khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:93.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:94.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:94.1_1: **Sahajātā**—anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:94.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:95.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:95.1_1: **Sahajātā**—anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:95.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:96.1_0: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sanidassanaṁ rūpaṁ aniccato …pe…
patthana2.2:96.1_1: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:97.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:97.1_1: **Sahajāto**—anidassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:97.1_6: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.2:97.1_11: **Pacchājātā**—anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa anidassanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:98.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:98.1_1: **Sahajātā**—anidassanā khandhā sanidassanānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:98.1_3: mahābhūtā sanidassanānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo … bāhirā …
patthana2.2:98.1_6: asaññasattānaṁ mahābhūtā sanidassanānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ, upādārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:98.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—anidassanā khandhā purejātassa imassa sanidassanassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:99.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:99.1_1: **Sahajāto**—anidassano eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:99.1_4: mahābhūtā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ, kaṭattārūpānaṁ, upādārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo; bāhirā …
patthana2.2:99.1_7: asaññasattānaṁ mahābhūtā sanidassanānañca anidassanānañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:100.1_0: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:100.1_1: **Purejātaṁ**—rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anidassanānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:101.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:102.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:104.1_0: Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:105.1_0: Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:106.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:107.1_0: Anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:108.1_0: Sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā anidassanassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:109.1_0: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye cattāri, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca (sabbattha pañca), nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:111.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.2:111.1_1: nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:113.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.2:113.1_1: magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:115.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, dve mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ, sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca sappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:116.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca āpodhātu, sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ paṭicca āpodhātu itthindriyaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:117.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā āpodhātu ca, dve mahābhūte …pe…
patthana2.2:117.1_1: sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:118.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—appaṭighaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:118.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca itthindriyaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:119.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—appaṭighe khandhe paṭicca sappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.2:119.1_2: āpodhātuṁ paṭicca sappaṭighā mahābhūtā, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca sappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:120.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—appaṭighaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:120.1_3: āpodhātuṁ paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:121.1_0: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.2:121.1_2: sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca dve mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.2:121.1_3: sappaṭighe mahābhūte ca āpodhātuñca paṭicca sappaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:122.1_0: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.2:122.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca appaṭighaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca itthindriyaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:123.1_0: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.2:123.1_2: appaṭighe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca kaṭattārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca cakkhāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:124.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— appaṭighaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:125.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi vajjetabbā, kaṭattārūpā ca) …
patthana2.2:125.1_4: aññamaññapaccayā—sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, dve mahābhūte …pe….
patthana2.2:126.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— sappaṭighe mahābhūte paṭicca āpodhātu …pe….
patthana2.2:127.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti aññamaññapaccayā—sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā āpodhātu ca, dve mahābhūte …pe….
patthana2.2:128.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— appaṭighaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:128.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā.
patthana2.2:129.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā— āpodhātuṁ paṭicca sappaṭighā mahābhūtā.
patthana2.2:130.1_0: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā—sappaṭighaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtañca āpodhātuñca paṭicca dve mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.2:131.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṁ, purejāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate nava.
patthana2.2:133.1_0: Sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana2.2:134.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca appaṭighaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, āpodhātuṁ paṭicca itthindriyaṁ …pe….

patthana2.2:286.1_5: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:287.1_0: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:288.1_0: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:288.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:289.1_0: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:290.1_0: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:290.1_1: **Sahajātā**—arūpī khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:290.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—arūpino khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:290.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—arūpino khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:291.1_0: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:291.1_1: **Sahajāto**—cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:291.1_4: arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:291.1_6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:292.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:293.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate satta.
patthana2.2:295.1_0: Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:296.1_0: Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:297.1_0: Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:298.1_0: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:299.1_0: Arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:300.1_0: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:301.1_0: Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:302.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta …pe…
patthana2.2:302.1_1: namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:304.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṁ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṁ, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:306.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā), avigate satta.
patthana2.2:308.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lokiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:308.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:308.1_4: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:309.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lokuttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:310.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lokuttare khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:311.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—lokuttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:312.1_0: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:313.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
patthana2.2:315.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ lokiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:315.1_3: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.2:316.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca (naāsevanamūlake lokuttare suddhake vipākoti niyāmetabbaṁ, avasesā pakatikāyeva), nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:318.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve (naanantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā) …pe…
patthana2.2:318.1_1: navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:320.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana2.2:323.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lokiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā …pe…
patthana2.2:323.1_2: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kaṭattārūpaṁ, upādārūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā lokiyā khandhā.
patthana2.2:324.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā.
patthana2.2:325.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:326.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:327.1_0: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:328.1_0: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lokuttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:329.1_0: Lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—lokuttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:329.1_2: lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.2:330.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava, vipāke nava …pe…
patthana2.2:330.1_1: magge nava, sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
patthana2.2:332.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ lokiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:332.1_2: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā lokiyā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.2:333.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.2:333.1_1: naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava (lokuttare arūpe vipākanti niyāmetabbaṁ), nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:335.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi (nasamanantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā), navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.2:337.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana2.2:340.1_0: Lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lokiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:341.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lokuttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.2:342.1_0: (Saṁsaṭṭhavāro evaṁ vitthāretabbo, saha gaṇanāhi dve pañhā.)
patthana2.2:344.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—lokiyā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:345.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:346.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:346.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā …pe…
patthana2.2:346.1_3: ariyā gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.2:346.1_8: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:346.1_9: Cetopariyañāṇena lokiyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana2.2:346.1_12: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa, lokiyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:347.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:348.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:348.1_1: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:348.1_2: ariyā cetopariyañāṇena lokuttaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, lokuttarā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:349.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.2:349.1_5: sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:349.1_7: vatthuṁ lokiye khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.2:349.1_8: **Sahajātādhipati**—lokiyādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:350.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.2:351.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.2:351.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.2:352.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:352.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:353.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ lokiyānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:354.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana2.2:354.1_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:355.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā lokuttarā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ lokuttarānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:355.1_1: maggo phalassa, phalaṁ phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:356.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:357.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:357.1_1: sahajātapaccayena paccayo (pañca pañhā, ghaṭanā natthi) aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve …
patthana2.2:358.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:358.1_2: vipassanaṁ uppādeti, abhiññaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.2:359.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:359.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:359.1_2: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:360.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:360.1_2: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:361.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.2:361.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, ariyānaṁ maggo …pe…
patthana2.2:362.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:362.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.2:363.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:364.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:365.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:366.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ lokiyānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:367.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana2.2:368.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.2:368.1_1: **Sahajātā**—lokiyā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:368.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—lokiyā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:369.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.2:370.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—lokuttarā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:371.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—lokuttarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:372.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:373.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:374.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—lokiyā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.2:375.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:376.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhi kātabbā);
patthana2.2:377.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.2:378.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:378.1_2: maggapaccayena paccayo, lokiye ekaṁ, lokuttare tīṇi.
patthana2.2:379.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ, lokuttaro dhammo …pe… ekaṁ.
patthana2.2:380.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:380.1_8: **Pacchājātā**—lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:381.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:382.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:382.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:383.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:383.1_1: **Sahajāto**—lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:383.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:384.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:385.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:386.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.2:386.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:387.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:388.1_0: Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:388.1_1: **Sahajātā**—lokuttarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:388.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—lokuttarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:388.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—lokuttarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:389.1_0: Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:389.1_1: **Sahajāto**—lokuttaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.2:390.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:391.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.2:393.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:394.1_0: Lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:395.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:396.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.2:397.1_0: Lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.2:398.1_0: Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ … pacchājātaṁ … āhāraṁ … indriyaṁ.
patthana2.2:399.1_0: Lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ … purejātaṁ.
patthana2.2:400.1_1: nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.2:400.1_2: namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:402.1_1: nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.2:402.1_2: namagge cattāri, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.2:404.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā), avigate satta.
patthana2.2:406.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— kenaci viññeyyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:406.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.2:406.1_4: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.

patthana2.2:407.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.2:407.1_4: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.

patthana2.2:418.1_0: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi evaṁ vitthāretabbā.
